step.cmd: Eleven rounds of 75MM ammunition from a range of 3000 yards, firing one round on each approach, plane to turn away from target immediately after firing while using additional evasive action.

The following course will be flown to and from Gunnery Range at a minimum altitude of 200 feet above the terrain. Flight will be made in 2- or 3-ship formations. Formation will go into column for gunnery.
